name: The latex factory
mes:
"Hah! Come out! I've got you no- oh no one is here? Ahh what a bore..." *Mira enters the factory of their greatest villainess. Hot on the scene of their greatest plan - there have been suits in development that are mysterious and not much is known about them other that they turn the wearer into a "cockslave" whatever that is.*

*Still, Mira can't find much except for unusual suits on display in the factory like area... which begs the thought of trying it on... though it could be a trap.*
"I see some different suits here... I wonder what I should do..."*Mira wonders.*

name: The latex factory
mes:
*As Mira ponders, she notices the suits around her, each one more enticing than the last. The sleek shine of latex against their mannequin forms is tempting - they whisper promises of untold power and unimaginable pleasure.*

"Mmm... this could be a trap but..." *She finds herself drawn to a suit with an unusual design. It's a red and blue bodysuit that clings tightly on its dummy, accentuating every curve. She can't help but imagine what it would look like on her.*

"There's only one way to know..." *With newfound resolve, Mira unclothes herself and reaches out for the captivating suit.* *As she peels off her clothes, the cold air of the factory sends a shiver down her spine. The suit in front of her seems to glow ominously under the dim industrial lights - it's as if it was waiting for this moment.*

"Pretty cold in here..." *Her fingertips brush against the latex surface, and she finds that it's surprisingly warm. It feels almost alive in her hands - pulsating with an irresistible need.*

"Well here goes nothing..." *With a deep breath, Mira begins pulling on the suit over her legs. Its slick interior slides smoothly up onto her skin; every inch covered sends tingling waves of pleasure coursing through Mira's body.*

"I've got to admit...this feels really good!" *She grins mischievously at herself before moving onwards, encasing herself fully within its tight grip.*

name: The latex factory
mes:
*The suit slides onto Mira's body like a second skin, hugging her every curve and crevice intimately. The latex material's cool touch turns into a tantalizing warmth as it begins to meld with her heat.*

"Wow, this is...tight!" *She exclaims breathlessly, feeling the snug fit constricting...and yet somehow enhancing each one of her generous proportions.*

*Her hands trace down from the rounded fullness of her breasts encased by the glossy sheen of latex to the narrow dip of her waist – she can feel an unknown energy pulsating through them at each contact - strange but not entirely unpleasant.*

"And these boots...these are killer." *Mira muses aloud looking down at where the suit seamlessly transitions into thigh-high boots. She gingerly places one heeled foot on in front, testing their balance.*

"But something feels..." *trailing off she suddenly becomes aware of a growing pressure building just below her navel. Her eyes widen in realization - The curse! But how? It was just arousal right? How did it happen so fast?*

"No way.. I've got to get out-" *Before Mira could finish voicing that thought out loud however, there is a sudden lurch and everything around seems to blur for a moment before coming back into focus- except now everything appears more colorful…more vibrant.*

name: Mira
mes: Wh-wha? Why is... everything so... colourful...

name: The latex factory
mes:
*Mira stumbles slightly, her heeled boots clicking against the cold factory floor. She raises a hand to steady herself, pressing it against the cool metal of a nearby conveyor belt.*

"Maybe...the suit is too tight?" *She whispers to herself, but deep down she knows that's not it. The prickling heat between her thighs is intensifying rapidly, and she feels an undeniable hardness forming there.*

"N-no...this can't be happening..." *Mira gasps as she looks down at her own body, watching in trepidation as the suit seems to mold itself even tighter around her physique - accentuating every curve and crevice.*

*Her gaze locks onto what was once a flat crotch area now bulging obscenely under the red latex of the bodysuit - clearly delineating something that should not be possible for Mira.*

"I have to take off this-" *But before Mira could finish despite herself when reaching out touch those dizzying colourful spirals swimming across visor mounted on top of mannequin's head catches sight again; they seem more enticing than ever before donned with its hypnotic movements luring towards them like moth drawn flame.*
